For common etiological agents causing diabetic foot infections, see Annexure B.9.7 
Additional Information:  
• 
For culture, tissue specimen (collected by curettage or biopsy) is preferred over swabs in 
soft tissue DFI. The sensitivity and specificity are higher for tissue specimens, though 
sampling from tissue requires training and may pose a minimal risk of discomfort or 
bleeding.
